name: Jimi
reviews: GoPro's Hero10 Black action cam delivers excellent, stabilized 5K video and ups still quality, but not everyone should spend more when the Hero8 Black is still available for less.

name: Daimen
reviews: The 360-degree GoPro Max camera promises an easier, more streamlined workflow than last year's Fusion, but has more niche appeal than the less expensive Hero8 Black.

name: Blowver
reviews: The GoPro Hero10 Black is the company's best action camera to date, offering class-leading stabilization and video quality in a rugged, waterproof body.

name: Rajin
reviews: The GoPro Hero10 Black is the company's best action camera to date, offering class-leading stabilization and video quality in a rugged, waterproof body.

name: Ferode
reviews: The shrunken-down GoPro Session may not offer any performance gains over its big brothers, but it's still quite good and more fun to use than other action cams.

name: Gomzee
reviews: If you're looking for a small action camera that can capture video at 4K, the GoPro Hero10 Black is the one to get and it's fun, Go and grab one.
